title: If there was one person to send back to ancient history, who would be the most qualified to advance human technology based on their current knowledge? - Quora

response.answer_text: it would depend on the time period and location. Any modern human would help just based on the things even an idiot knows (if they survived actual living) But assuming a couple thousand years…and a coastal area of the civilized world: An Amish Farmer, with a keen interest in large shipbuilding (particularly sail making tech), who dabbles in vaccine production, over 6′4 and built, who has worked in mining, dug wells, midwifed births, run a cult, been in the military, speaks ancient latin or chinese fluently, and has precise knowledge of geography, ocean currents, and gold resources. Oh…and isnt really troubled by killing people.
